title: anudinamu kaavumaiya
sahitya:
anudinamunu kAvumayya Adi venkaTEshvarA

anupallavi

 ghanuDaku mahA krpa kaTAkSamunu kOriti nannu

caraNam

 kanakaruci nIrUpamu kAkOdhara shayanA rAmA tanarunIdu darshanamu dalaci moraliDanu
 kanakana paritApamulanu kanikaramutO dIrcci vanaja lOcanuDagu shrInivAsa varada vEgamE nannu
